actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 162(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the deduction of certain expenses by members of State legislatures.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow Members of State legislature the same income tax business deduction for living expenses as is allowed Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 162(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the deduction of certain expenses by members of State legislatures.
